parameters.name: From
parameters.description:
The source of data. Default value: **aqs**. Valid values:

*   **sas**: Security Center
*   **aqs**: Server Guard

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group.

> You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~130972~~) operation to query the IDs of asset groups.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or public IP address of the asset.
